name: Valorant - Mobile concept design
description:
I decided to finish my Valorant project with the concept of a mobile version.


On the agents page I made a horizontal scroll with a large promo of champions and also added a filter with a choice of searching by role, alphabet and complexity. On the agents inner page you can see information about him and his abilities, clicking on it will open a video. I also showed how the open menu will looks like.


What's inside :

- Agents List

- Search Block

- Agent Page

- News Page

- Open Menu


I am always available for new projects!
